Job Description: Job Title:   iPhone Developer    : 1.5 +years    Qualification:   Any IT/Computer Degree/Bachelor Degree Must.      CTC:   No bar for deserving candidate     Job description:      Proficient with Objective-C or Swift, and Cocoa Touch     Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.     Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning     Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services     Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards     Understanding of Apple s design principles and interface guidelines     Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred     Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools     Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications     A knack for benchmarking and optimization     Proficient understanding of code versioning tools     Familiarity with continuous integration
